CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND( OR( ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Level_Product__r.ProductCode = 'AA-ASN', ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Level_Product__r.ProductCode = 'AA-AJN'), YEAR(TODAY()) - ucinn_ascendv2__Purchaser__r.First_ISU_Degree__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Degree_Year_Number_Formula__c = 5), ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Level_Product__r.ProductCode = 'AA-ASA', ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Level_Product__r.ProductCode = 'AA-AJA', ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Level_Product__r.ProductCode = 'AA-ASQ', ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Level_Product__r.ProductCode = 'AA-AJQ'), 57, IF( ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Level_Product__r.ProductCode = 'AA-ASNGD', 30, IF( Product_Family__c = 'Life', (ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Purchase__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Remaining_Amount_Due_Formula__c / ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Purchase__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Number_of_Unpaid_Installment__c), IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Purchase__r.ISUAA_Membership_Amount__c)), ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Purchase__r.ISUAA_Membership_Amount__c, ucinn_ascendv2__Membership_Purchase__r.Amount))))
CustomField.label: Membership Dues Amount
